prompts: /thoughtbox:interleaved-thinking-workflow (MCP) task="take a look at the specs/docker-local-first/README.md specification. we've already implemented the SQLite database and Drizzle ORM, and now we're turning our attention to Dockerization. I want us to enforce the criteria that we are not yet affording the ability for multiple agents to use Thoughtbox at once, that *is* one axis along which this is moving. I want us to be able to run docker-compose up and down easily, and to consider what utility we will get out of a mounted volumes architecture." thoughts_limit=1000 clear_folder=negative
